TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DisplayMetrics extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: A structure describing general information about a display, such as its size, density, and font scaling.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Equals(class Android.Util.DisplayMetrics other) cil managed

Docs.param: The display metrics with which to compare.
Docs.summary: Returns true if these display metrics equal the other display metrics.
Docs.returns: True if the display metrics are equal.
